class pygace.examples.sto.new_gace.Runner(app=None, iter_idx=None)[source]¶

app
iter_idx

Methods

create_dir_for_DFT([task_fname]) Function to create directories for DFT calculation for ground-state configurations candidates in each GA iteration.
god_view() In some cases, the number of all candidate configurations in sample space is limited, and we can enumerate these configurations one by one to calculate CE energis, which is a fast and efficient way to obtain potential ground-state structures than standard genetic algorithms selection.
run()
print_gs  
create_dir_for_DFT(task_fname='./DFT_task.dat')[source]¶

Function to create directories for DFT calculation for ground-state configurations candidates in each GA iteration. This function is used to God_view function. The identical functional method in a standard GACE iteration is included print_gs member function in STOApp. :param task_fname: name of a file containing directories for DFT calculations. :return: None

god_view()[source]¶

In some cases, the number of all candidate configurations in sample space is limited, and we can enumerate these configurations one by one to calculate CE energis, which is a fast and efficient way to obtain potential ground-state structures than standard genetic algorithms selection. :param iter_idx: the time of iteration. :return: None

print_gs()[source]¶
run()[source]¶

create_dir_for_DFT(task_fname='./DFT_task.dat')[source]¶

Function to create directories for DFT calculation for ground-state configurations candidates in each GA iteration. This function is used to God_view function. The identical functional method in a standard GACE iteration is included print_gs member function in STOApp. :param task_fname: name of a file containing directories for DFT calculations. :return: None

evalEnergy(individual)[source]¶

Evaluation function for the ground-state searching problem.

The problem is to determine a configuration of n vacancies on a crystalline structures such that the energy of crystalline structures can obtain minimum value.

ind_to_elis(individual)[source]¶

convert individual (number list) to element list :param individual: :return:

Function to create directories for DFT calculation for ground-state configurations candidates in each GA iteration. This function is used to God_view function. The identical functional method in a standard GACE iteration is included print_gs member function in STOApp. :param task_fname: name of a file containing directories for DFT calculations. :return: None

god_view()[source]¶

In some cases, the number of all candidate configurations in sample space is limited, and we can enumerate these configurations one by one to calculate CE energis, which is a fast and efficient way to obtain potential ground-state structures than standard genetic algorithms selection. :param iter_idx: the time of iteration. :return: None

create_dir_for_DFT(task_fname='./DFT_task.dat')[source]¶

Function to create directories for DFT calculation for ground-state configurations candidates in each GA iteration. This function is used to God_view function. The identical functional method in a standard GACE iteration is included print_gs member function in STOApp. :param task_fname: name of a file containing directories for DFT calculations. :return: None

evalEnergy(individual)[source]¶

Evaluation function for the ground-state searching problem.

The problem is to determine a configuration of n vacancies on a crystalline structures such that the energy of crystalline structures can obtain minimum value.

get_ce()[source]¶

Function used to get the CE object contained in STOApp object :return: CE object

ind_to_elis(individual)[source]¶

convert individual (number list) to element list :param individual: :return:

transver_to_struct(element_lis)[source]¶

Function used to transveer list of number to str.out file in ATAT program.

Convert element list to ATAT str.out file :param element_lis: list of number :return: str, filename of ATAT structure file, default str.out
